results.name: First differences of A131572.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 2).
mathematica: Differences[LinearRecurrence[{0,2},{0,1,2},50]] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[ {0, 2}, {1, 1, 0}, 50] (* or *) Join[{1},Riffle[2^Range[0,30],0]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 10 2018 *)
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Aug 28 2007
